com.pi4j.component.potentiometer.microchip

Interface MicrochipPotentiometerDeviceStatus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MicrochipPotentiometerDeviceStatusImpl

    public interface MicrochipPotentiometerDeviceStatus
    The device-status concerning the channel this instance of MCP45XX_MCP46XX_Potentiometer is configured for.
    Author:
    Raspelikan
    See Also:
    MicrochipPotentiometerBase
